description: Shambani Pro is a pioneering social enterprise in Kenya focused on reducing post-harvest loss for smallholder farmers. By establishing a network of microfactories, we convert surplus produce into high-quality value-added products, enhancing farmers' incomes and contributing to food security. Our innovative model addresses market inefficiencies, promotes sustainable practices, and aims to empower local communities while minimizing environmental impact. We are committed to creating a resilient food system that benefits both people and the planet.
name: Shambani Pro
